mapper.sql: id as id , profession_type as professionType , profession_sub_type as professionSubType , profession_name as professionName , profession_description as professionDescription , hot_degree as hotDegree , salary_rank as salaryRank , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , id_delete as idDelete
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_profession ( profession_type, profession_sub_type, profession_name, profession_short, profession_description, hot_degree, salary_rank, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, id_delete ) VALUES ( #{professionType}, #{professionSubType}, #{professionName}, #{short}, #{professionDescription}, #{hotDegree}, #{salary_rank}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{idDelete} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_profession
profession_type = #{professionType},
profession_sub_type = #{professionSubType},
profession_name = #{professionName},
profession_short = #{short},
profession_description = #{professionDescription},
hot_degree = #{hotDegree},
salary_rank = #{salaryRank},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
id_delete = #{idDelete},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_profession
profession_type = #{map.professionType},
profession_sub_type = #{map.professionSubType},
profession_name = #{map.professionName},
profession_short = #{map.short},
profession_description = #{map.professionDescription},
hot_degree = #{map.hotDegree},
salary_rank = #{map.salaryRank},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
id_delete = #{map.idDelete},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_profession ( profession_type, profession_sub_type, profession_name, profession_short, profession_description, hot_degree, salary_rank, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, id_delete ) VALUES ( #{map.professionType}, #{map.professionSubType}, #{map.professionName}, #{map.short}, #{map.professionDescription}, #{map.hotDegree}, #{map.salaryRank}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.idDelete} )
mapper.select: select zp.id, zp.profession_name as professionName, zp. profession_type as professionTypeId, zpt.profession_type as professionType, zp.profession_sub_type as professionSubTypeId, zptt.profession_type as professionSubType, zp.salary_rank as salaryRank, zp.hot_degree as hotDegree, zpd.introduction as introduction, zpd.relate_major as relateMajor, zpd.vocational_demand as vocationalDemand, zpd.work_content as workContent, zpd.career_prospects as careerProspects from zgk_profession zp left join zgk_profession_type zpt on zp.profession_type=zpt.id left join zgk_profession_type zptt on zptt.pid = zpt.id and zptt.id = zp.profession_sub_type left join zgk_profession_detail zpd on zp.id = zpd.id where zp.id = #{id}

SELECT
, id
, profession_type
, profession_sub_type
, profession_name
, profession_description
, hot_degree
, salary_rank
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, id_delete
FROM zgk_profession
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND profession_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.professionType} , '%')
AND profession_sub_type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.professionSubType} , '%')
AND profession_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.professionName} , '%')
AND profession_description like CONCAT('%', #{condition.professionDescription} , '%')
AND hot_degree like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hotDegree} , '%')
AND salary_rank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.salaryRank} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND id_delete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.idDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}

select id,profession_type as Type from zgk_profession_type where 1=1
AND pid is null
AND pid=#{pid}
AND profession_type like CONCAT('%', #{type} , '%')
